newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Opus transferred to JSE Industrial section.
newsitem.headline: Opus transferred to JSE Industrial section.

text.p: Opus Investments Ltd advised shareholders that its ordinary shares of one cent each had been transferred to the Industrials-"Beverages, Hotels and Leisure" section of the Johannesburg Stock Exchange with effect from the commencement of business on Monday.
Opus was previously listed under the Financial-"Investments Trusts" section.
